title: Wedding Goddess: A Divine Guide to Transforming Wedding Stress into Wedding Bliss
description: A lively how-to guide for brides-to-be shares the secrets of planning and carrying out the perfect wedding, with helpful advice on everything from creating personalized rituals and vows, to throwing a terrific bridal shower, to finding the perfect dress, flowers, music, and more. Original.
author: Laurie Sue Brockway
